title: Cannot synchronize a .java file and another resource
OB: When attempting to synchronize a .java file and another resource, such as a .properties file, in the package viewer, the synchronization fails.
EB: The synchronization should successfully update both the selected .java file and the other resource in the package viewer.
SR: To reproduce the bug: 1. Select a .java file and another resource (e.g., a .properties file) in the package viewer.
